Remove the binning information from the provided datamart predictor data so it only is predictor level, not more detailed. This is commonly used in plotting functions.

filterPredictorBinning.Rd

Remove the binning information from the provided datamart predictor data so it only is predictor level, not more detailed. This is commonly used in plotting functions.

filterPredictorBinning(dt)

Arguments

dt

The data.table with the datamart predictor data.

Value

A data.table without the predictor binning.

Examples

data(adm_datamart)
filterPredictorBinning(adm_datamart$predictordata)

#>                                              PredictorName
